root.name: Brain Bender
root.description: OverviewBrain Bender (known as Migraine in Japan) is a puzzle game developed by Gremlin Interactive and published by Electro-Brain for the Game Boy platform.GameplayIn Brain Bender, mirrors are manipulated in order to get them to reflect a laser beam into some balls of gas and destroy the satellite. Brain Bender features 120 different puzzles to solve.
